sentence_zh_TW: 在這個公司裡，所有的初級職位均需要經過為期六個月的培訓來適應工作環境。
sentence: In this company, all ______ positions require a six-month training period to adapt to the work environment.

sentence_zh_TW: 為了保持頭髮的柔順，選擇適合的洗髮精非常重要，這樣可以防止頭髮受損。
sentence: Choosing the right ______ is very important to keep hair smooth and prevent damage.

sentence_zh_TW: 可持續使用的天然資源是保護我們環境的關鍵因素，能夠幫助減少污染。
sentence: Sustainable natural ______ are key factors in protecting our environment as they help reduce pollution.

sentence_zh_TW: 這串珠子是由各種顏色的珠子製成的，非常適合用來製作手工藝品。
sentence: This string of ______ made from various colors is perfect for crafting.

sentence_zh_TW: 在炎熱的夏天，吃一片冰涼的西瓜是最好的消暑方法之一，能讓你感到清新。
sentence: Eating a slice of chilled ______ on a hot summer day is one of the best ways to cool off and feel refreshed.

sentence_zh_TW: 在夏天的池塘附近經常可以看到蜻蜓，它們優雅地在空中飛舞，吸引了許多人的注意。
sentence: You can often see a ______ near ponds in summer, fluttering gracefully in the air, drawing the attention of many.

sentence_zh_TW: 在沙灘上，孩子們興奮地追逐著那些快速跑來跑去的螃蟹，享受著海邊的樂趣。
sentence: On the beach, the children excitedly chased the rapidly scuttling ______, enjoying the fun of the seaside.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這片森林中，茂密的松樹提供了陰影，讓遊客在炎熱的日子裡感到舒適。
sentence: In this forest, the dense ______ trees provide shade, making it comfortable for visitors on hot days.

sentence_zh_TW: 這種水被標記為純粹，因為它經過多重過濾，不含有害物質，非常適合飲用。
sentence: This water is labeled as ______ because it has gone through multiple filters and is free of harmful substances, making it ideal for drinking.

sentence_zh_TW: 在極端的運動中，選手必須保持高度的警覺，以便能夠及時避開潛在的危險。
sentence: In extreme sports, athletes must remain highly ______ in order to dodge potential dangers in an instant.

sentence_zh_TW: 釣魚的時候正確選擇誘餌是成功的關鍵，它能吸引魚類靠近你的釣鉤。
sentence: Choosing the right ______ when fishing is key to success as it attracts fish to your hook.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這次事故中，車輛之間的碰撞造成了嚴重的損壞，並導致多人受傷。
sentence: The ______ between the vehicles in this accident caused significant damage and resulted in multiple injuries.

sentence_zh_TW: 那部電影深受觀眾喜愛，因為它成功地將恐怖與幽默元素融合在一起，讓人捧腹大笑的同時又有些驚悚。
sentence: The movie was a hit among audiences as it successfully combined ______ with humor, making them laugh while feeling a bit scared.

sentence_zh_TW: 為了讓這台機器正常運行，你需要將插頭插入插座，這才能提供所需的電源。
sentence: To make this machine work properly, you need to insert the ______ into the socket, which will provide the necessary power.

sentence_zh_TW: 許多企業正努力促進員工之間的團隊合作，以提高整體效率和工作氛圍。
sentence: Many companies are working hard to ______ teamwork among employees to enhance overall efficiency and workplace atmosphere.

sentence_zh_TW: 這款手機內部的晶片讓它在市場上脫穎而出，提供了令人驚嘆的功能。
sentence: The chip inside this smartphone makes it stand out in the market, providing astonishing features.

sentence_zh_TW: 他因為錯誤的姿勢而感到背部非常僵硬，甚至在一天的工作結束後也沒有好轉。
sentence: He felt his back was very stiff due to poor posture, and it didn't improve even after a long day at work.

sentence_zh_TW: 在黑暗的房間裡，孩子們因為害怕而緊緊地抓住他們的玩具，耳邊傳來了奇怪的聲音。
sentence: In the dark room, the children held their toys tightly, feeling fearful as strange noises echoed around them.

sentence_zh_TW: 原本計劃在本週五舉行的會議因為某些因素而不得不延後到下個月。
sentence: The meeting originally scheduled for this Friday had to be postponed until next month due to certain factors.

sentence_zh_TW: 當他開始倒這瓶酒時，注意到了酒杯的美麗，這讓他覺得今晚的晚餐將會非常特別。
sentence: As he began to pour the bottle of wine, he noticed the beauty of the glass, making him feel that tonight's dinner would be very special.
